head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISINGER, ESTHER (NEE SILVERMAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEISINGER, ESTHER (NEE SILVERMAN)

block.p: WEISINGER-Esther (nee Silverman) of Boynton Beach, FL, on June 4, 1997. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Arthur S. Weisinger. Devoted mother of Dr. Martin and Roberta Weisinger and Dr. Barbara Weisinger. Loving grandmother of Dr. Andrew, Barbara and Lynn Weisinger. Funeral services were held on Friday June 6, 1997, in the Beth Israel Cemetery, Woodbridge, NJ. For further information contact Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vaux Hall Road, Union, NJ.
